Description: Technical activities related to the Engineering, Design and retrofitting (Electrical and Mechanical) of Electrical Equipment, including MV/LV Switchgear, Control gear, LV Panel Board / Switchboard, Protection and control Relay Panels, Switch rack, Cable Bus, Power Factor Correction Equipment (Capacitor Bank with Filter Reactor and associated protection & control, other VAR compensations', etc.) coordination of activities, preparation of related documentation.Skills
Skills: Technical knowledge related to Engineering, Design & Retrofitting (Electrical and Mechanical) of Electrical Equipment, MS Office and AutoCAD and MicroStation Software.
Direct work experience of minimum 5 years in the field of Engineering, Design & Retrofitting (Electrical and Mechanical) of Electrical Equipment.
